Title: A Message Most Dire
Description:
Kalecgos would not speak of what happened in the Azure Span till you arrived.

Whatever he has to share gives me a terrible sense of foreboding, $n.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Alexstrasza at the Seat of the Aspects within Valdrakken.
RewardText:
Raszageth! She is attempting to find them... This is profoundly disturbing news.

We do not know where her Primalists will be next. Our city must be protected from her chaos.
